name: Oakland Public Library Digital Resources
description: Free digital resources including ebooks, audiobooks, databases, and online learning with Oakland library card
fullDescription: Oakland Public Library provides free digital resources including ebooks, audiobooks, streaming media, and learning platforms for Oakland cardholders.
whatTheyOffer:
- Ebooks and audiobooks
- Streaming movies and music
- Online learning courses
- Research databases
- Magazines and newspapers
- Language learning
howToGetIt:
1. Get an Oakland Public Library card (free for Oakland residents)
2. Visit oaklandlibrary.org/resource
3. Browse available digital resources
4. Sign in with your library card
5. Access content on any device
keywords: Oakland Public Library, Oakland, digital resources, ebooks, audiobooks, streaming, online courses, databases, magazines
